name: Novotel Vilnius

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed three nights at Novotel booked through yeego.com - got great rate.
reviews.title: Great Hotel
Perfect
reviews.text: The hotel is quite new and hence everything is quite clean and fresh although the breakfast room was a bit more used looking, with stains on the carpets from people spilling orange juice, etc. Apart from that though the hotel is spotless.
Staff were very helpful both before our visit (organising airport trnasfer) and during our stay.
reviews.title: excellent
Great hotel at good price
reviews.text: I have never stayed in such a quiet hotel either, with no noise audible from other guests, nor any street noise (we were on 6th floor looking out of the side of the hotel towards the Cathedral.
As far as location is concerned Novotal is pretty good being on Gedimimos Prospektas, its right in the heart of the town, with only a short walk to all the sights.
reviews.title: Perfect Location
very central
reviews.text: Nice and central hotel, located on the main shopping street. Rooms are very Novotel and service is very good, reception, restaurant staff very friendly. Room windows can't be opened, and there was a bit of an old smell in the room. I requested a non smoking room but they couldnt accomodate my needs so I was given a smoking roomk which i didnt like.

reviews.title: excellent hotel - superb value
reviews.text: Breakfast is very good, at the time there were lots of Spanish and Italian older citizens on a tour who really pushed their way in to get their breakfast. Would reccomend early breakfast before all tables are taken. Didnt look nice to see guests putting food into their begs and management just couldnt do anything. Breakfast was very nice, lots of different cheeses, breads etc.

reviews.title: Cannot be beat for price and location! We loved it.

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for four days Sept 14-18. The rooms were clean and had comortable beds and were also extremely quiet. Well-equipped bathrooms (with that all-important bath as well as a shower). Staff polite and welcoming. Superb value booking at just over £200 for four nights ('hot deal' booked well in advance). Nice position just 10 mins from the old town, but also well placed for the department stores in the 'new town'. The hotel restaurant is also good value and served excellent no-nonsense food. Breakfast impossible to fault - with a wide range of hot and cold food on offer.
reviews.title: Central Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked for 4 days on Novotel website. We cannot have been more pleased. Our room had a view of Cathederal, 3 crosses, and old town. The staff was very helpful and spoke excellent English. It's easy walking distance to any of the sights of Vilnius.
reviews.title: Value!
Great new hotel in the heart of Vilnius
reviews.text: This hotel opened just a few months ago. It is a typical Novotel with 3 to 3.5 star quality rooms. My room had a comfortable double bed with comforter, couch, safe, and bathroom with both tub and shower. It was very quiet. Breakfast buffet was tasty. Great location - just a few blocks from the main cathedral and on the outskirts of Old Town. I got an unbelievably low rate for this stay but their rack rates are a bit high for the competitive Vilnius hotel market.

description: The Novotel Vilnius is a 4 star hotel in the historic and commercial heart of Vilnius. Business travellers enjoy the convenience of free WiFi internet and four meeting rooms and will find major financial institutions, businesses and government departments close by. The Novotel on the so called Champs Elysees of the Lithuanian capital is also perfect for a holiday exploring the romantic streets of the Old Town. After a busy day, relax in the hotel gym or sauna or enjoy our restaurant and bar.
